metadata.title: CVE-2019-18601 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenAFS before 1.6.24 and 1.8.x before 1.8.5 is prone to denial of servicefrom unserialized data access because remote attackers can make a series ofVOTE_Debug RPC calls to crash a database server within the SVOTE_Debug RPChandler.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
